_header: Charity chastity pity aren waxen all cold
_description: The Evils of the Time — four 3-line stanzas

BLHar7322.First Lines: Charite chaste pite arn waxin al coldeCouetise Lust & maistrie arn becomin al boldeConsel god acord & wedloc ben nou noþing of tolde…
BLHar7322.Last Lines: …vertu godede & almisdede arn al forsakeOker leiyng & wantonesse mickel serwe make
BLHar7322.Note: Written as prose, inserted into Latin.
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
